articles.title: Nissan reveals name, design of its latest C-SUV â€˜Tekton'
articles.author: Daily Excelsior
articles.summary: Nissan Motor India has revealed the name and design of its newest SUV, the 'Tekton'. Designed to disrupt the C-SUV segment, the Tekton draws design inspiration from the Nissan Patrol and embodies engineering excellence and performance, manufactured in partnership with Renault at the Chennai plant for sale.

articles.title: Lamborghini offers a look into its future
articles.author: Ben Zachariah
articles.summary: Lamborghini released first images of the Manifesto, a new concept car. The Manifesto previews the future design direction of the Italian performance car maker.

articles.title: Amazon is giving Samsung Z Fold 7 shoppers its most generous discount yet - how ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 excels in almost every aspect of a modern handset. It is considered the most complete foldable phone tested so far.

articles.title: Mary Kay is applying AI: Brand uses tech to simplify makeup choices
articles.author: Brian Womack
articles.summary: Mary Kay has launched a new AI-powered service, AI Foundation Finder, designed to help users select the right foundation shade by using a device's camera. The service, accessible through marykay.com without app download, scans the user's face, analyzes 150 facial points, and suggests from over 50 shades available.

articles.title: â€˜My sh*t, my food': Chinese CEO's Aus rant
articles.author: Matt Campbell
articles.summary: GWM is launching new plug-in hybrid vehicles, including the GWM Haval H6 plug-in hybrid SUV, and plans to debut a new 3.0-liter turbo-diesel engine in Australia in 2026. The company has also reduced the price of its Cannon Alpha Hybrid ute. GWM aims to increase its market share in Australia, where it has seen a surge in sales in 2025.

articles.title: Shh! Amazon just secretly discounted the most viral beauty Advent calendar for Prime ðŸ’„
articles.author: Kyley Warren
articles.summary: Revolution Beauty's 2025 Makeup Advent Calendar, featuring beauty best-sellers, launched and was initially released to a large waitlist. It is now available on Amazon and currently on sale during the Amazon's October Prime Day event.

articles.title: Wienerschnitzel enters retail sector
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: A fast-food chain is launching two products in retail stores. The launch expands the chain's presence beyond its restaurants.

articles.title: B&G Foods, Kellanova launch taco innovation
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: Cheez-It and Ortega are combining their brands to create a new product.

articles.title: Google launching 'most powerful AI search experience yet' in Australia
articles.author: Jorge Branco8:30am
articles.summary: Google is launching AI Mode, a new AI-powered search experience based on Gemini AI models, in Australia and 40+ other countries. This new search feature allows users to ask more complex questions and receive AI-generated responses accompanied by links, offering a different search experience from traditional methods and chatbots. Google claims it enhances the search experience by providing broader and deeper answers compared to traditional search.

articles.title: Tesla offers cheaper versions of 2 electric vehicles in bid to win back market share in tough year
articles.author: Japan Today
articles.summary: Tesla introduced new, cheaper versions of its Model Y electric car models on Tuesday. The company hopes these new offerings will help revive flagging sales.

articles.title: Blue Banner Company Launches Goody The New Gold Standard In Citrus Packing And Shipping
articles.author: MENA FN
articles.summary: Blue Banner Company is celebrating its anniversary by introducing a new generation of products from its brand, Goody.

articles.title: Break up with your liquid detergent. Try these plastic-free laundry sheets instead
articles.author: The Guardian
articles.summary: Detergent sheets offer the same cleaning power as liquid detergents but with less weight and no sticky spillage. This new format provides a convenient and mess-free alternative for consumers.

articles.title: A Beginner's Guide to Getting Started With Google Ads Services
articles.author: Oki Bin Oki
articles.summary: Google Ads services help businesses place ads on Google search results, YouTube, partner sites, and apps, allowing them to target specific keywords. Businesses can use Performance Max campaigns, supported by AI, to run across search, display, video, and more. To optimize outcomes businesses should track conversions, avoid broad keyword targeting, keep campaigns focused, and review performance regularly.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Big Deal Days: Save 57% On Nespresso Machine
articles.author: Rosalyn Fannin
articles.summary: De'Longhi Nespresso Vertuo Pop Capsule Coffee Machine is on sale for $99 (originally $229) during Amazon Prime Big Deal Days. This machine brews coffee in four lengths using patented centrifusion extraction technology and connects to Wi-Fi for software updates. It also powers off after two minutes and is made from 35% recycled plastic.

articles.title: Teradata: AI-Powered Customer Intelligence & Actionable Data
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Teradata is enhancing its Vantage CX platform with AI-driven capabilities to automate and scale customer experience (CX) operations, leveraging real-time data integration. This update focuses on three key pillars: integration, real-time data signals, and AI model deployment, moving beyond historical data analysis to proactively shaping customer journeys. The goal is to empower businesses to deliver personalized and exceptional customer experiences through hyper-personalization, predictive customer service, and AI-powered journey orchestration.

articles.title: We picked the 7 best Ninja deals this Amazon Prime Day 2025
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Amazon is offering discounts on various Ninja products as part of their Big Deals Day. The discounted items include the Ninja Blast Portable Blender, Ninja Cold Press Juicer Machine, Ninja Foodi PossibleCooker, Ninja Foodi MAX Dual Zone Air Fryer, Ninja Foodi StaySharp 6 Steak Knives, Ninja Swirl by CREAMi Soft Serve & Ice Cream Maker, and Ninja Luxe Premier 3-in-1 Coffee Machine.

articles.title: Amazon Prime launches â€˜Add to Delivery' feature in app. How it works.
articles.author: Melina Khan
articles.summary: Amazon has launched a new feature called "Add to Delivery" on its Amazon Shopping mobile app and Amazon.com on mobile devices, allowing Amazon Prime members in the United States to add additional eligible items to an order that has already been placed. This new feature does not require users to go through checkout again, and there are no additional shipping costs.

articles.title: Tesla unveils new lower-cost Model Y amid rising competition
articles.summary: Tesla introduced a new, lower-cost version of its Model Y electric car. This launch is aimed at boosting sales amid increasing market competition in the electric vehicle sector.

articles.title: How to Choose the Right Face Wash for Your Skin Type
articles.author: Press Releases
articles.summary: Deconstruct offers two face wash products: Deconstruct Salicylic Acid Face Wash for oily or acne-prone skin, formulated with salicylic acid and niacinamide to exfoliate, remove sebum, and reduce acne. Deconstruct Vitamin C Brightening Face Wash, combines vitamin C and niacinamide to cleanse, even out skin tone, and brighten normal to dull skin.

articles.title: 5 Android myths that just won't die (but should)
articles.author: John Kanellakos
articles.summary: The article highlights the evolution of Android's user interface, specifically mentioning the Material 3 Expressive design that debuted on the recently released Pixel 10 series. Modern Android 16 features expressive visuals, playful animations, and a consistent, colored theming engine.

articles.title: Perfect Moment Launches New City Outerwear Capsule Collection
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Perfect Moment Ltd. has launched its first City Outerwear Capsule Collection. This new product line signifies the brand's expansion from alpine wear to year-round global lifestyle wear.

articles.title: illumin Ignites Bold New Era with Brand Overhaul and Platform Upgrades, Lighting Up New York During Advertising Week  Oct. 7, 2025 19:55
articles.summary: illumin Holdings Inc. launched a new brand identity and AI-powered advertising platform with the tagline 'See More. Achieve More.' The upgraded platform features faster campaign launches, streamlined workflows, and a novel forecasting tool. These enhancements aim to provide marketers with superior data-driven insights and AI-powered optimization.

articles.title: My favorite foldable phone of all time just hit a record-low price on Amazon

articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7 is identified as the most complete foldable device tested.

articles.summary: Tineco, Shark, Dyson, Ultenic, Eufy, iRobot, Yeedi, Black+Decker, Hoto, KitchenAid, Bissell, and Eureka are offering various vacuum cleaners with discounts during the Prime Day sale. These include cordless, robot, handheld, and wet/dry vacuums, with features such as smart home integration, self-cleaning, and powerful suction, many at record-low prices.

articles.title: Tesla offers cheaper versions of 2 electric vehicles in bid to win back market share in tough year
articles.author: BERNARD CONDON
articles.summary: Tesla introduced cheaper versions of its Model Y and Model 3 electric car models. The new Model Y costs just under $40,000, and the cheaper Model 3 is offered for under $35,000.

articles.title: Ditch your liquid laundry detergent â€“ use sheets instead (and what brand to buy)
articles.author: Jon Chan
articles.summary: HeySunday offers laundry detergent sheets that are convenient, eco-friendly, and effective at cleaning clothes. These sheets are septic- and hand-wash safe, biodegradable, and come in a pleasant Ocean Breeze scent. The brand provides online purchase options with discounts for recurring shipments.

articles.title: Tesla offers cheaper version of its best-selling EV in bid to win back market share in a tough year
articles.author: Bernard Condon
articles.summary: Tesla introduced a new, cheaper version of its Model Y electric car, priced just under $40,000. This stripped-down model aims to attract more customers amidst flagging sales and increased competition.

articles.title: Amex At 175 Years Old: Why Gen Z Is Saying 'Member Since'
articles.author: Jeff Fromm
articles.summary: American Express launched new Platinum cards with benefits tailored to Gen Z lifestyles, after extensive user testing. They also introduced a travel app that puts membership benefits on mobile and facilitates travel planning through points redemption. These initiatives are part of a broader strategy to create relevant experiences and personalized services that resonate with the Gen Z demographic, aimed at fostering loyalty and brand engagement.

articles.title: Amazon Omaha Delivery Station opens
articles.summary: Amazon has opened a new delivery station in Omaha, near 72nd State. This launch expands Amazon's delivery network within the Omaha area.

articles.title: ChatGPT Integrates with Applications for Enhanced Playlist Creation in Spotify and Graphic Design in Canva" This title suggests a direct integration with applications and focuses on specific functiona
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: OpenAI launched its Apps SDK, a new service that connects ChatGPT with third-party applications. The SDK enables users to directly initiate tasks within external platforms through ChatGPT commands.  Currently, ChatGPT connects to services like Spotify, Canva, Figma, Coursera, Zillow, Expedia, and Booking.com, with plans to integrate more like Doordash and Uber throughout 2025.

articles.title: Spotify teams up with ChatGPT for personalized recommendations
articles.author: Alimat Aliyeva
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched a new integration for ChatGPT, allowing users to connect external app controls directly within the chatbot. Leading services like Spotify, Canva, and Zillow are piloting these built-in application interfaces. OpenAI plans to broaden access later this year, inviting developers to submit their own applications, thus enhancing ChatGPT's capabilities.

articles.title: Dyson has up to 44% off during Amazon Prime Big Deal Days

articles.summary: Dyson vacuums, hair stylers, and headphones are available at discounted prices during Amazon's Prime Big Deal Days. The sale is a limited-time event.

articles.title: Why 3D Scanning Services Are Essential for Modern Manufacturing
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: A 3D scanning service is being utilized to capture detailed surface data of car frames for retrofit and custom parts design. This process facilitates accurate 3D modeling and product development, reshaping product design, testing, and production.

articles.title: This Chick-fil-A Hack Unlocks a Secret Breakfast Mini

This DIY item, assembled from existing menu components, offers a sweet and savory alternative to the standard breakfast options and resembles something from Chick-fil-A's test kitchen.

articles.summary: Acxiom's technologies, specifically connected data and AI-driven personalization, improves marketing campaign performance. Interact, leveraging Acxiom's data, assisted an online entertainment company by boosting customer acquisition and improving ad spend, resulting in a 60% lift in media campaign performance. These applications show how Acxiom can turn audience engagement into sustainable growth for its clients.

articles.title: I ate the new Arby's Steak Nuggets so you don't have to
articles.author: Nick O'Malley
articles.summary: Arby's introduced Steak Nuggets, available as a five or nine-piece order, and the Steak Nugget Bowl, featuring Steak Nuggets served on a bed of mac & cheese and fried onion rings. articles.author: JOE
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a 20% discount on the CONOPUPlus 12L/Day Dehumidifier as part of its Prime Big Deal Days sale. The device helps in drying clothes indoors by removing moisture and preventing dampness and mould.

articles.author: Kaylee Remington
articles.summary: Arby's has introduced Steak Nuggets, a limited-time menu item. These hand-cut, bite-sized pieces of steak are seasoned with garlic and pepper, seared and smoked. Customers can enjoy them as an entree, in a sandwich, or in a bowl.

Other deals include Ninja Air Fryers, Samsung QLED TVs, and Babyliss hair styling products along with Felix cat food also receiving discounts.

articles.title: Xbox's new handheld will run you a cool thousand dollars
articles.author: Grant St. Clair
articles.summary: Xbox, in collaboration with ASUS, is launching the ROG Xbox Ally X, a handheld gaming device priced at $1000. A budget option is available for $600. The device is presented as an alternative to the Steam Deck.

articles.title: 'Fiery' new Babybel flavour leaves shoppers divided as they spot it in supermarkets
articles.author: Lucy Marshall
articles.summary: Babybel has launched a new plant-based flavor called Mini Babybel Hellfire, available exclusively at Morrisons and Sainsbury's. The spicy snack, made from coconut oil, modified potato starch, and a mix of red bell pepper, red jalapenos, and cayenne, is sold in packs of six for Â£2.25. Early reactions from shoppers have been divided, with some praising it and others criticizing its taste and texture.

articles.title: Morrisons and Sainsbury's shoppers spot new Babybel flavour and say same thing
articles.author: Lucy Marshall
articles.summary: Babybel has launched a new plant-based and spicy flavor called 'Mini Babybel Hellfire,' available exclusively at Morrisons and Sainsbury's. The new flavor is timed with the release of Stranger Things 5. The packaging is vibrant orange, and the flavor contains coconut oil, modified potato starch, red bell pepper, jalapenos, and cayenne.

articles.title: Fashion Week de Paris : mais qu'est ce qui se passe la nuit?
articles.author: Sophie Volanges
articles.summary: An apparel company is launching a new line of high-end baby clothes. The company uses an agency to create profiles of wealthy young parents to target advertising within partner apps.

articles.title: 'Innovative' steak nuggets come to Arby's. Where you can get them in CT
articles.author: Bailey Allen
articles.summary: Arby's has launched a new product called steak nuggets, available from October 6th for a limited time. These bite-sized pieces of steak are seared, smoked, and seasoned with garlic and pepper and can be ordered as an entree with Hickory BBQ sauce or in a sandwich with Havarti cheese, crispy onions, tangy pickles, and mayonnaise on a toasted bun, or in a bowl with crispy onions on a bed of creamy white cheddar mac and cheese.

The vacuum has a 40 minute battery life and converts easily to handheld.

articles.title: Santander bank customers aged 18 to 73 urged to spend Â£17 in October
articles.summary: Santander has introduced the Edge Explorer account, a new banking service with a monthly fee of Â£17. This account offers a range of benefits including 24/7 virtual GP access, no-fee spending abroad, and cashback on purchases, competing with similar offerings from Barclays and Lloyds. Additional perks include worldwide family travel insurance, UK and European breakdown cover, and access to the Santander Edge saver account with a high AER for the first year.

articles.title: 10 Best Vacuum Cleaners in UK (Dyson vs Shark vs Henry)
articles.author: Robin Williams
articles.summary: Dyson, Shark, and Henry are featured with their updated or new vacuum cleaners, including the Dyson V15 Detect with its laser dust detection, the Shark Stratos Anti-Hair Wrap designed for pet owners, and the enduring Henry Hoover. Other models, such as the Dyson Gen5detect, Shark Cordless Detect Pro, Henry Pet, Dyson Omni-Glide, Shark Upright Lift-Away, Henry XL Plus, and Dyson V8 Absolute, cater to various needs from allergy sufferers to large families, providing a range of options in terms of features, price, and performance.

articles.title: 37 Things You Should Buy In Bulk During Fall Prime Day
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: Puracy, a Texas-based company, offers a plant-based, chemical-free, hypoallergenic laundry spray. The spray effectively removes various stains including wine, coffee, and blood, even after prior unsuccessful attempts with soap and water.

articles.summary: OpenAI has launched 'Instant Checkout' and 'apps' to establish ChatGPT as a platform for AI-driven commerce. This allows services like Uber, Expedia, and others to integrate into ChatGPT, creating a unified shopping experience. This represents a new line of business for OpenAI, facilitating direct purchases and recommendations within the ChatGPT interface.

The Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra features a thin design, powerful processor, bright display, and a reimagined S Pen, while the Galaxy Tab A11 is positioned as an everyday learning and entertainment tool with expandable storage and long battery life. Both tablets will be available starting September 25, 2025.

It also includes the Creator Opportunity Network for creators to find paid brand deals.

The 256GB model is priced at Â£299.99 at Amazon, while the 128GB model is Â£260.99.

articles.title: 22 Beauty Deals You'll Want from Amazon Prime Day
articles.author: Lauren Balsamo
articles.summary: Amazon is holding Prime Big Deal Days on October 7th and 8th, featuring discounts of up to 50% on beauty products. Featured sales include discounts on essentials like shampoo and face sunscreen, as well as tech beauty tools like Shark's blow dryer and a red light hat.

articles.title: Kmart releases $179 version of $500 product
articles.author: Claudia Poposki
articles.summary: Kmart has released a new $179 Slushie Maker that is drawing comparisons to the more expensive Ninja Slushie. The Kmart spokesperson described the new maker turns soft drinks into icy treats which become ready in 30 to 60 minutes, positioning it as an affordable and fun kitchen gadget.

articles.title: OpenAI puts popular apps like Spotify and Canva inside ChatGPT: See the full list here
articles.summary: OpenAI's ChatGPT now integrates with Spotify, Canva, Coursera, Figma, and Zillow, allowing users to access these services directly within the chatbot via text prompts. Users can, for example, create Spotify playlists, design Canva posters, or search Zillow rental listings through ChatGPT. More integrations are planned, including Uber, DoorDash, and others, with developers able to build and monetize their own apps for ChatGPT in the future.

articles.title: AI playing its part
articles.summary: Partly has developed an AI-based foundation model to streamline the search for replacement car parts, aiming to connect the world's cars, parts, and people in a single, automated, global supply chain. The AI model uses photograph, written description or voice memo to identify what's needed and orders it from a supplier. The company plans to go for a second round of funding in 2026.

articles.title: ALDI releases digital hub â€˜ALDIfy', via Digitas
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: ALDI Australia, in collaboration with Digitas, has launched 'ALDIfy', a digital hub that provides recipe inspiration. This platform utilizes AI to curate trending recipes using ALDI products, making them easily shoppable through ALDI stores and the DoorDash app. Zenith leads the media strategy, deploying the campaign across various digital and OOH channels.

articles.title: OnePlus OxygenOS 16 to be launched this month: Check date, features and other details here
articles.author: Trending Desk
articles.summary: OnePlus will launch OxygenOS 16, based on Android 16, on October 16. This update features AI integration with Google's Gemini in a new 'Mind Space' hub and a design overhaul inspired by iOS Liquid Glass. OxygenOS 16 is expected to align with OPPO's ColorOS 16.

articles.title: **Why iRobot's Founder Keeps a Distance from Modern Walking Robots: Insights from Content Writer, Not Virtual Assistant**
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: iRobot strategically focuses on practical robotics, expanding into new markets like aerial robotics through the Aerovironment acquisition. They continue to innovate their Roomba line with enhanced features such as improved navigation, cleaning performance, and smart home integration, showcasing their commitment to practical and efficient robotic solutions for everyday tasks.

articles.title: Salespeak Prepares B2B Brands for a World Where AI Is the Buyer
articles.summary: Salespeak introduces an AI-native platform that transforms traditional B2B websites into intelligent interfaces designed to enhance buyer engagement. It replaces traditional funnels and provides personalized, real-time conversations, capturing buyer insights and improving conversion rates. The platform also prepares websites for AI agents, ensuring that key product data is accessible to both human buyers and AI.

articles.title: 29 Early Fall Prime Day Deals For Anyone Looking To Upgrade Their Home
articles.author: Sally Elshorafa
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a wide array of discounted products for Fall Prime Day. These include the Amazon 4K Fire TV Stick with smoother streaming and voice-powered search, the Ninja blender and food processor combo with a 1600-watt motor and multiple accessories, Staub pumpkin cocottes for seasonal cooking, Breville Infuser Espresso Machine for barista-level coffee at home , Shark Navigator vacuum and many other products from brands like Ugg, SodaStream, EcoFlow, Yankee Candle, Levoit, Samsung, Saigo, Govee, Instant Pot, and Nap Guardian.

articles.title: Marketing through the looking glass: The wearable AI shift
articles.summary: Meta has introduced AI glasses, marking a shift towards wearable tech. This transition from devices we look at to devices we look through will require marketers to adapt to 'glanceable' content and prioritize the ethics of intimacy in data usage. CleverTap's data science VP suggests brands that design for presence without intrusion will be successful in the wearable AI space.

articles.title: Amazon EC2 C8i Instances: Faster Compute & Flexibility
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) has launched its C8i and C8i-flex instances, powered by custom Intel Xeon 6 processors. The new instances deliver improved price-performance and memory bandwidth compared to previous generations, with up to 60% faster performance for NGINX web applications. C8i instances are designed for consistent maximum CPU performance, while C8i-flex instances offer a cost-optimized alternative for workloads with fluctuating demands.

articles.title: We Tried Bonny's Doona and Sheets â€“ Here's Our Honest Review
articles.author: Holly Bodeker-Smith
articles.summary: Bonny, a Melbourne brand known for its doonas, launched its first sheet range in August. The sheets are made from GOTS-certified organic cotton and feature a design with labelled corners and a thick elastic band. Bonny also offers a 14-day guarantee, donating returned items to local charities.

articles.title: I'm a tech critic, and this Dyson's ontrac headphones deal is one you won't want to miss
articles.author: Alex Lee
articles.summary: Dyson launched its Ontrac headphones, known for modular design, personalization options, and high-quality audio with a Â£250m investment in audio technology. These wireless headphones boast class-leading active noise cancellation, customizable colors, and 55-hour battery life. Currently, Amazon is offering a 40% discount on the Dyson Ontrac headphones during its Prime Big Deal Days sale.

articles.title: Rare Â£100 saving on Dyson airwrap in the Amazon Prime Day 2025 sale
articles.author: Daisy Lester
articles.summary: Dyson's Airwrap i.d multistyler is currently on sale during Amazon's Prime Big Deal Days event. Amazon is offering a rare Â£100 discount on the tool, which includes a long barrel for curls, a coanda smoothing dryer, and a round volumising brush.

articles.title: Music Industry Moves: Hybe America Launches Label Service, Ups Ryan Hyeong Woo Noh to Chief ...
articles.author: Variety
articles.summary: Hybe America has launched Hybe Label Services (HSL). HSL is the company's first global organization focused on label services.

articles.title: Foreign visitors snap up Chinese tech products
articles.summary: Hangzhou-based companies recently unveiled ten "sci-tech souvenirs," including AR glasses, sleeping aids, and exoskeleton robots. WENSLI Group launched AIGC-customized scarves, allowing customers to create personalized designs. These new products are attracting foreign consumers due to their innovative technology and cost-effectiveness.

articles.title: GOFO Launches 400,000-Square-Foot New Jersey Super Hub, Adding Over 800,000 Parcels of Daily Capacity and Strengthening Coast-to-Coast Delivery Network
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: GOFO officially launched its New Jersey Super Hub. This marks the full operation of GOFO's largest and most advanced logistics facility in the United States.

articles.title: Dubai launches Founders HQ to power next wave of UAE startups
articles.author: Arabian Business
articles.summary: Sheikh Hamdan launched Dubai Founders HQ. Dubai Founders HQ is a startup hub.

articles.title: Is Mike Novogratz Set to Kill Robinhood? Galaxy Stocks Explode As Rival App Launches
articles.author: 99 Bitcoins
articles.summary: Galaxy Digital has launched a new retail trading app designed to rival Robinhood. The app combines features like cash yields, crypto access, and commission-free stock trading. This launch has led to a rise in Galaxy Digital's stock price.

articles.title: Super Star Car Wash opens new Glendale location
articles.author: Glendale Star Staff
articles.summary: Super Star Car Wash has launched its 56th express car wash location in Glendale, Arizona. The new location offers express car washes and premium treatments like graphene and ceramic sealants. To celebrate the grand opening, Super Star Car Wash is offering free car washes for a limited time and a special discount on its Super Protect unlimited membership.

articles.title: PowerWash Simulator 2 Launches on October 23rd
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: FuturLab is launching PowerWash Simulator 2 on October 23rd for Xbox Series X/S, PS5, PC, and Nintendo Switch 2. The game will retail for $24.99 and feature 38 new jobs in Muckingham.

articles.title: PowerWash Simulator 2 launches later this month
articles.author: Eurogamer
articles.summary: PowerWash Simulator 2 will launch on October 23, 2025. The game will be available on PC, PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch 2.

articles.title: PowerWash Simulator 2 Release Date Revealed for Later This Month
articles.author: Tech Raptor
articles.summary: FuturLab announced the release date for PowerWash Simulator 2. The game will allow players to clean Muckingham.

articles.title: Payper Launches GEO Service to Put Kiwi Brands on Top of AI Search
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Payper PR, a New Zealand PR firm, has launched a new Generative Engine Optimisation (GEO) service. This service is designed to help Kiwi brands achieve top placement in AI tool recommendations.

articles.title: Once again, the SteelSeries Arctis Nova Pro Wireless has had its price slashed at Prime ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Amazon offers a deal on the SteelSeries Arctis Nova Pro headset for customers who cannot afford the Arctis Nova Elite.

articles.title: Shark cordless vacuum with 'long lasting battery' drops to 'lowest price' in Prime sale
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: A shopper claims the Stratos Vacuum Cleaner outperforms Dyson vacuum cleaners. This implies the existence and market presence of the Stratos Vacuum Cleaner and highlights a potential advantage over a competitor.

articles.title: Wait, What?! Luxury Fashion Brands on October Prime Day Saleâ€”70% Off
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Amazon is positioning itself as a designer destination with the introduction of Amazon Luxury Stores. This suggests a new service offering luxury goods within the existing Amazon marketplace.

articles.title: Roll Into Prime Savings: YEEDI's Flagship Robot Vacuums Lead the Smart Cleaning Charge This Prime Day
articles.author: Polk County Itemiser-Observer
articles.summary: YEEDI is showcasing its products M14 PLUS, M12 PRO+, and C12 PRO PLUS during Prime Big Deals Day. These products feature powerful roller mop technology and auto-cleaning systems.

articles.title: Take 31% Off the Dreame X50 Ultra Robot Vacuum That Outsmarts My Furniture This Prime Day
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Dreame X50 Ultra has been tested and is now available with a $500 discount.

articles.title: Johnson & Johnson ordered to pay $966 million after jury finds company liable in talc ...
articles.author: system
articles.summary: J&J discontinued its talc-based baby powder sales in the U.S. in 2020. The company switched to a cornstarch-based baby powder product.
